markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 407 4.0 **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283) **Duration** 1 minute --- You gain one of the following abilities of your choice. You can Dismiss this spell.
  • You gain a 20-foot status bonus to your Speed.
  • You gain a climb or swim Speed equal to half your Speed.
  • You gain darkvision.
  • You gain a pair of claws. These are agile finesse unarmed attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage.
  • You gain scent 60 feet (imprecise).
name: Shifting Form

summary_markdown: You morph to gain an ability of your choice.
text: Shifting Form Source Core Rulebook pg. 407 4.0 Cast Single Action somatic Duration 1 minute --- You gain one of the following abilities of your choice. You can Dismiss this spell. You gain a 20-foot status bonus to your Speed. You gain a climb or swim Speed equal to half your Speed. You gain darkvision. You gain a pair of claws. These are agile finesse unarmed attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. You gain scent 60 feet (imprecise).
